name: Persona 5 Royal Demake
description:
This is a fan-made demake for a school project.

Notes: Yet to finish implementing sounds, also the application of some sounds may be a little buggy/incomplete.

Controls (GAMEPAD ONLY):
Button A: Confirm/Continue
D-Pad (Up & Down): Choice navigation
For testing:
Right Trigger: Hold for increasing game time scale/speed.
